text: thæcring brrda phu ptiseth sraththa læa khadkhwang tha ngxallxh læa masyid xal ha rxm sung rea di tha man wi sahrab mnusʹy xyang theatheiym kan thang phu thi phanak xyu nı nan læa thima cak phaynxk læa tha phu dı prarthna thi ca xxk nxk thang dwy khwam xthrrm rea k ca hı khea lim rs kar lngthosʹ xyang cebpwd
